addAAVEUnderwater: Adding liquidity failed as your Aave position might go underwater.
addCompoundUnderwater: Adding liquidity failed as your Compound position might go underwater.
addSNXUnderwater: Adding liquidity failed as your Synthetix position might go underwater.
addStakedSNX: Adding liquidity failed as your SNX is locked in staking.
addTransferBlocked: Adding liquidity failed as one of the underlying tokens blocked the transfer.
amountExceedsBalance: Token amount should not exceed balance
approveToken:
To invest in this pool, you must grant Balancer
permission to transfer each token from your
wallet. This must only be done once.
beforeCreatingPre: Before creating this pool, make sure the
cannotAddLiquidity: The pool controller has not enabled adding liquidity to this pool
capRightExplanation:
Cap set to initial supply;
raise to enable public LPs
changeControllerWarning:
Ensure you have the private key.
Otherwise you will lose control of the pool! If you want to control the pool from the Balancer interface you need to use a proxy account as controller, don't use your wallet directly as controller.
confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove the token
connectWalletToAddLiquidity: Please connect your wallet to continue
createProxy: Create a proxy contract to manage liquidity on Balancer. This is a one-time action and will save you gas in the long run.
createProxyTip:
Create a proxy contract to manage liquidity
 on Balancer. This is a one-time action
 and will save you gas in the long run.
createSharedTip: Shared pools cannot change after creation
createSmartTip: Smart pools can change when granted rights
creator: Creator
deadPoolWarning: The controller has removed all tokens from this pool; you can no longer interact with it.
disclaimer: By continuing you agree that Balancer Labs is not liable for any losses you may incur
enablePauseTrading: Enable or pause trading in your pool
errExceedsBalance: Token amount should not exceed balance
errInconsistentTimelock: Minimum gradual weight change duration must be >= add token timelock
errInvalidDenorm: Weight percentages must be between {min} and {max}
errMaxPoolTokens: Pool should contain no more than 8 tokens
errMinPoolTokens: Pool should contain at least 2 tokens
errMinTokenBalance: Token balance in wei form needs to be at least 1,000,000. For example, WBTC has 8 decimals, so the minimum is 0.01 WBTC.
ethBuffer: Keep some ether to pay for gas.
highRiskPool: This is a higher-risk pool that contains one or more unlisted tokens. A liquidity pool is only as good as its weakest token! If a token were blacklisted, infinitely minted, frozen, or exploited in any other way, the value of this pool could go to 0. Balancer Labs is never liable for losses incurred through using our UI or the Balancer protocol. Be careful, and do your own research!
infoWeightUpdate: Weight update will {tokenAction} {tokenAmount} {tokenSymbol} tokens and {bptAction} {bptAmount} {bptSymbol} pool tokens
liquidityFail: Adding liquidity might fail with max balance if a trade occurs before the transaction is mined. Use high gas price or
marketAmounts: Calculate token amounts using market prices
minimumSwapFee: There is a minimum swap fee of
myProxy: My proxy address (used for adding liquidity and creating pools)
noPendingTransactions: You don't have any pending transaction.
noProxy: You have not yet created a proxy (for adding liquidity or creating pools)
noTokenFound: No token found for this search
ongoingUpdate:
There is a gradual weights update underway
from {startTime} ({startBlock})
until {endTime} ({endBlock})
ongoingUpdateLoading: There is a gradual weights update underway... waiting for block information
percentRange: Weight range limited to {min}% - {max}% when change weights enabled
pokeWeightsEarly:
The pool has an ongoing gradual weight update
(see About), but has not yet started.
pokeWeightsGeneral: The pool does not currently have an ongoing gradual weight update. If it did, 'Poke' would set the weights to values along the update curve, corresponding to the current block.
pokeWeightsOngoing: The pool has an ongoing gradual weight update (see About). 'Poke' will set the weights to values along the update curve, corresponding to the current block. This operation may change token prices, and might be gas-intensive.
removeTokenWarning:
• Removing a token will redeem BPTs for the balance
• If you remove all tokens, the pool will be irrevocably destroyed
selectTokens: Select up to 8 tokens you’d like to have in the pool.
successAddLP: You've successfully added a provider to the whitelist
successCanProvideLiquidity: You've successfully checked liquidity provider status
successChangeCap: You've successfully changed the smart pool supply cap
successChangeSwapFee: You've successfully changed the swap fee
successChangeWeight: You've successfully changed the token weight
successPokeWeights: You've successfully poked the smart pool
successRemoveLP: You've successfully removed a provider from the whitelist
successRemoveToken: You've successfully removed the token from the smart pool
successSetController: You've successfully set the smart pool controller
successUpdateGradually: You've successfully set the weights update schedule

tokenWarning2: Do not add deflationary tokens, tokens with transfer fees, or any other non-ERC20-conforming tokens.
